alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Central Walton; Inland Bay; Jackson; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 3:11PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Jackson, northern Bay, northwestern Calhoun, east central Walton and Washington Counties in the Panhandle of Florida through 300 PM CDT... At 211 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 17 miles south of Marianna to 11 miles south of Vernon. Movement was northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Vernon, Bradford, Live Oak, Cottondale, Alford, Wausau, Ebro, Moose Pond, Fountain, Camps Head, Holmes Valley, Millers Ferry, Porter Lake, Smyrna, Compass Lake, Sylvania, Brock Crossroad, Betts, Orange Hill and Kynesville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Central Walton; Inland Bay; Jackson; Washington
